thread.title: NFL Week 8 point spreads, over/under: Giants open as 3.5-point underdog to Saints
thread.title_full: NFL Week 8 point spreads, over/under: Giants open as 3.5-point underdog to Saints | syracuse.com

author: Hank Domin | hdomin@syracuse.com
title: NFL Week 8 point spreads, over/under: Giants open as 3.5-point underdog to Saints
text:
The New York Giants are a 3.5-point road underdogs against the New Orleans Saints next week.
The Giants (4-3) earned a 27-20 win over the Dallas Cowboys and are alone in first place in the NFC East. The Saints (3-4) have won three of their last four games.
The Buffalo Bills (3-4) have a bye next week. The Bills lost to the Jaguars, 34-31 , on Sunday in London.
Below are the odds for NFL games this week courtesy of America's Line.
